org.apache.nutch.searcher

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.searcher.Query
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public final class Query
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    A Nutch query.

      • getTerms

        public java.lang.String[] getTerms()
        Flattens a query into the set of text terms that it contains. These are terms which should be higlighted in matching documents.

      • parse

        public static Query parse(java.lang.String queryString,
          java.lang.String queryLang,
          org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Parse a query from a string using a language specific analyzer.
        Parameters:
        queryString - is the raw query string to parse
        queryLang - is a two-letters language code used to identify which NutchAnalyzer should be used to parse the query string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        AnalyzerFactory

      • parse
